      public boolean checkOutBook(int id) throws IOException
      This method checks-out a book from the catalog and updates the information of the book
      Parameters:
      id - ID's book to checks-out
      Returns:
      true if the book can be checkedOut or false if the book cannot be checkedOut or doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IOException - file related errors

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook(int id) throws IOException
      This method returns a book to the catalog and updates it's information

      id - ID's book to return
      Returns:
      true if the book is returned to the catalog or false if the book is already returned or doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IOException - file related errors
